pasugiya palath sabha mathiwaranaye puththalama disthrikkaya sandaha nikuthkala , bhawitha karana lada chanda pathrika thogayak puththalama shantha anda‡∑≤ widyalayiya shalawe thibi hamuwi athi athara mewa hamuwimath samanga pradeshaye unusumkari thaththwayak hatagena atha.mema chanda pathrika hamuwu shantha anda‡∑≤ widyaliya shalawa mema mathiwaranaye puththalama disthrik chanda ganan kirime madhyasthana 55 pihita wu godanagili sankirna deken ekakieeye (24) dahawal ema godanagille pohora ura thunak thibenu daka ayek ee bawa wagakiwa yuththanta danwimen pasu pariksha kirimedi eewaye thibune pawichchi karana lada chanda pathrikama bawa heliwi thibe.ema chanda pathrikawalin wadi kotasak dekata madin irathibu bawa heliwi atha.puththalama disthrik lekam ha therimbhara niladhari kinsli pranandu, sahakara mathiwarana komasaris sumith chandana, kottasabhara polis adhikari anura abewikrama niladharinda athulu usas niladharin rasak pamina parikshana arambaa athi athara pradeshawasin wishala pirisak ee awata raswi siti nisa unusumkari thaththwayak athi wi atha.mathiwaranayata tharaga kala jayagath manthriwarun menma parada wu apekshakayan owunge aadhara karuwanda ekwa sitiyaha.samaya aaraksha kirima sandaha polis aarakshawa yodawa atha..
ge awadhanayata yomu karana bawayi.
